title: Five-Star Private Beach Luxury in the Greek Islands
description: Escape to the sun-soaked Greek island of Crete, staying for five nights at the five-star Daios Cove Luxury Resort & Villas, complete with its own beautiful private beach. Receive an automatic upgrade to a Deluxe Sea View Room with uninterrupted views across the Mediterranean Sea, daily breakfast, nightly dinners, a complimentary bottle of wine and fruit basket, welcome drinks and one-hour of free spa access for two.

title: Five-Star Private Beach Luxury in the Greek Islands with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinners & More
description: Escape to the sun-soaked Greek island of Crete, staying for four nights at the five-star Daios Cove Luxury Resort & Villas, complete with its own beautiful private beach. Receive an automatic upgrade to a Deluxe Sea View Room with uninterrupted views across the Mediterranean Sea, daily breakfast, nightly dinners, a complimentary bottle of wine and fruit basket, welcome drinks, one-hour of free spa access, EUR50 resort credit and much more.
location_description: Daios Cove Luxury Resort & Villas OLD
